channel.title: Comments on: Props to O’Reilly (and others)

item.title: by: Douglas Clifton
item.description:
I'm a big fan of O'Reilly, there are stacks of books published by them lying around here. But come on, no other advocates of Open Source, Linux, Apache and friends?

  1. Apple
  2. Slashdot
  3. Ars
  4. Linux Journal
  5. Artima Developer
  6. Sourceforge
  7. Mozilla
  8. W3C

just to name a few. There are some others that you wouldn't even think of, the BBC for instance, and even Playboy.

Have a look at these categories in my resource index:

  • Open Source
  • Linux
  • PHP

and so on... ~d
item.content:encoded:
I’m a big fan of O’Reilly, there are stacks of books published by them lying around here. But come on, no other advocates of Open Source, Linux, Apache and friends?

  1. Apple
  2. Slashdot
  3. Ars
  4. Linux Journal
  5. Artima Developer
  6. Sourceforge
  7. Mozilla
  8. W3C

just to name a few. There are some others that you wouldn’t even think of, the BBC for instance, and even Playboy.

Have a look at these categories in my resource index:

  • Open Source
  • Linux
  • PHP

and so on… ~d
